articles.author: Daniel Flick
articles.title: How Curt Cignetti Keeps Indiana Football from Making Champ Game 'Bigger Than It Is' - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: On the verge of winning everything, Curt Cignetti still works as if he's won nothing. Indiana football has adopted the mentality entering the College Football Playoff National Championship Game vs. Miami.
articles.content:
BLOOMINGTON, Ind. Amid his rise from relative unknown to one of the nations most captivating head coaches, Curt Cignettis schedule hasnt changed.
Cignetti still arrives at Indiana footballs Memorial… [+9049 chars]
